jing2021characterizing.title: Characterizing partisan political narrative frameworks about COVID-19 on Twitter
jing2021characterizing.author: Jing, Elise and Ahn, Yong-Yeol
jing2021characterizing.typeNotRelevantText: The paper mentions at the beginning the MFT as an option for identifying narratives used by politicians to convey their morals, but then uses just antonyms from WordNet. The rest of the paper is then about the Narrative Policy Framework and does not focus on morality anymore.
